issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

new since last week. Titanium SDK version: 1.5.0 (12/06/10 08:42 4d92d40). reproduces on G2 and the nexus 1, not seen using g1 or the emulator running 2.2.

1.BaseUI > Views > scroll Views
2.scroll to bottom, and using trackball or finger tap "scroll to top"

results: nothing occurs

3.do it again

results: works now. not repro in last weeks 1.5.0.faa27c7 pull

{html}
fields.summary: Android: scroll views > basic, "scroll to top" eats first press

comments.body:
{html}

Neither Thomas or I could reproduce this so marking fixed. If it ever shows back up we'll re-open.

{html}
